# Support

Thanks for using `terraform-hcloud-talos`.

## Bugs and feature requests

- Please open a GitHub issue with a minimal reproduction and relevant logs.

## Questions

- If you have a question about configuration or troubleshooting, open an issue and include your Terraform/Talos
  versions and a redacted configuration snippet or start a discussion.

## Financial support

If this module saved you time or money, consider supporting ongoing maintenance:

- GitHub Sponsors: https://github.com/sponsors/hcloud-talos
- Buy Me a Coffee: https://buymeacoffee.com/mrclrchtr

Sponsorship is a way to keep the project sustainable and say thanks. It does not include a support SLA. Sponsors can
be acknowledged publicly via GitHub Sponsors.
